column4: I feel like formatting my entire disk and putting Linux back on it, Arch or Ubuntu, but my friend insist I get Windows 7, what do you peeps think
You're on #ubuntu, we're obviously going to tell you to put Ubuntu on it.
If you went in #archlinux, they'd tell you to use Arch. If you went in ##windows, they'd probably also tell you to use Linux :\
I was more like joking about :P
